The image captures a moment at Buckingham Palace during the changing of the guard ceremony, which was scaled back due to extreme heat. A soldier in traditional ceremonial attire is being assisted by a security officer. The soldier is dressed in a bright red uniform with gold buttons and a black bearskin hat, holding a rifle. He appears to be experiencing heat-related distress, as he is receiving assistance from the security officer, who is providing him with water or possibly oxygen. The security officer is wearing a dark vest over a white shirt and has a radio attached to his belt. The background features part of the palace's ornate architecture, including a stone balustrade and a blue door with gold trim. The scene conveys a sense of urgency and care, highlighting the impact of extreme weather conditions on public events and individuals.
A person dressed in a traditional red uniform with a black fur hat, holding a rifle and appearing to receive assistance.
A bald man wearing a white shirt and black vest, providing assistance to the guard.
A building with ornate architectural features, including a column and a gold-trimmed door.

The image is a triptych featuring three large-scale sculptures by the influential Pop artist Claes Oldenburg. From left to right: The first sculpture is 'Spoonbridge and Cherry,' depicting a giant spoon with a cherry on top, placed in a serene park setting with greenery and a pond in the background. The second sculpture is 'Shuttlecocks,' showing an oversized shuttlecock standing upright on a grassy lawn in front of a grand neoclassical building. The third sculpture is 'Cupidâ€™s Span,' which consists of a massive bow and arrow, set in a grassy area with a clock tower visible in the distance. Each sculpture transforms ordinary objects into extraordinary and imposing art pieces, creating a whimsical and striking visual impact.
A large sculpture of a spoon with a cherry on top, located in a park setting with trees and a pond in the background.
A large sculpture of a shuttlecock, located in front of a classical building with columns.
A large sculpture of an arrow and bow, located in a grassy area with a clock tower in the background.
A green park area with trees and a pond, where the Spoon and Cherry Sculpture is located.
A large, classical-style building with columns, where the Shuttlecock Sculpture is located.
A grassy area where the Cupid's Span Sculpture is located, with a clock tower in the background.
